mapper.select: SELECT S_DOMAIN, S_SID, S_HOMEPAGE_LOC, S_HOSPITAL_ID FROM DB_ALLPET.pet_home_basic_info WHERE S_DOMAIN = #{value}

SELECT BI.s_sid, BI.s_s_sid, BI.s_hospital_name, BI.s_hospital_id, BI.s_hospital_pw, BI.s_status, BI.d_reg_date, BI.s_reg_user, BI.d_update_date, BI.s_update_user, BI.s_president, BI.s_corp_reg_number, BI.s_company_name, MI.s_introduce, MI.s_shortIntroduce, MI.s_keyword, MI.s_display_tel, MI.s_tel, MI.s_parking_info, MI.s_credit_info, MI.s_email, MI.s_fax, MI.s_represent_staff, MI.s_hospital_name_use, ( SELECT s_name FROM DB_ALLPET.T_STAFF_INFO WHERE S_STID = MI.s_represent_staff ) s_represent_staff_name, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM DB_ALLPET.T_STAFF_INFO WHERE S_SID = #{value} AND S_STATE = 'Y' ) s_staff_count FROM DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_BASIC_INFO BI, DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO MI WHERE BI.S_SID = MI.S_SID AND BI.S_SID = #{value}

SELECT (SELECT s_hospital_name FROM DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_BASIC_INFO WHERE S_SID = #{value}) s_hospital_name, BI.s_old_addr_sido, BI.s_old_addr_sigungu, BI.s_old_addr_dong, BI.s_old_addr_etc, BI.s_old_zipcode, BI.n_latitude, BI.n_longitude, MI.s_display_tel, MI.s_tel FROM DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_ADDRESS BI LEFT OUTER JOIN DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_MORE_INFO MI ON BI.S_SID = MI.S_SID WHERE BI.S_SID = #{ssid}
SELECT s_sid, n_index, s_name, s_start_time, s_end_time, s_alltime, s_dayoff, s_comment FROM DB_ALLPET.T_HOSPITAL_WORKING_TIME WHERE S_SID = #{ssid}
SELECT s_iid, s_image_path FROM DB_ALLPET.T_IMAGE WHERE S_SID = #{ssid} AND S_LKEY = #{imageKey} ORDER BY N_INDEX
